name: RevolveChurch
0:
”Alexa, open Revolve Church”
”Alexa, ask Revolve Church for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start Revolve Church”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: revolve church
des: Listen to the latest sermon from Revolve Church. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer. For more information you can visit Revolve Church online at www.revolvechurchnj.com
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
